alert.note: Alert for Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 29 at 2:55AM MDT until May 29 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN MINNEHAHA...LINCOLN AND NORTHEASTERN TURNER COUNTIES... At 355 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ellis to near Tea to 7 miles south of Worthing, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Sioux Falls, Harrisburg and Crooks around 400 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Renner, Brandon, Lake Alvin State Recreation Area, Corson, Rowena, Newton Hills State Park, Canton, Valley Springs, Palisades State Park and Garretson. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
